verses.verse: "On my <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> after night I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him <S%H7945>Whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves;<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him but did not <S%H4672>find<s%> him.

'I must <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> and <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> In the <S%H7784>streets<s%> and in the <S%H7339>squares<s%> I must <S%H1245>seek<s%> him <S%H7945>whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves.<s%>' I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him but did not <S%H4672>find<s%> him.

"The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> who <S%H5437>make<s%> the <S%H5437>rounds<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> me, [And I said,] 'Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> him <S%H7945>whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%>?'

<S%H4592>"Scarcely<s%> had I <S%H5674>left<s%> them <S%H5704>When<s%> <S%H7945><s%> I <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7945>whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves;<s%> I <S%H270>held<s%> on to him and would not <S%H7503>let<s%> him <S%H7503>go,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> I had <S%H935>brought<s%> him to my mother's <S%H1004>house,<s%> And into the <S%H2315>room<s%> of her who <S%H2029>conceived<s%> me."

"I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> By the <S%H6643>gazelles<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> That you will not <S%H5782>arouse<s%> or <S%H5782>awaken<s%> [my] <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> she <S%H2654>pleases.<s%>"

<S%H4310>"What<s%> is <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5927>coming<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> Like <S%H8490>columns<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> <S%H6999>Perfumed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> With <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H81>scented<s%> <S%H81>powders<s%> of the <S%H7402>merchant<s%>?

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> it is the [traveling] <S%H4296>couch<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon;<s%> <S%H8346>Sixty<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it, Of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> of them are <S%H270>wielders<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3925>Expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war;<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has his <S%H2719>sword<s%> at his <S%H3409>side,<s%> [Guarding] <S%H4480>against<s%> the <S%H6343>terrors<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
<S%H4428>"King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> for himself a <S%H668>sedan<s%> <S%H668>chair<s%> From the <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

"He <S%H6213>made<s%> its <S%H5982>posts<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> Its <S%H7507>back<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> [And] its <S%H4817>seat<s%> of <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H713>fabric,<s%> [With] its <S%H8432>interior<s%> <S%H160>lovingly<s%> <S%H7528>fitted<s%> out By the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3318>"Go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And <S%H7200>gaze<s%> on <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with the <S%H5850>crown<s%> With <S%H7945>which<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> has <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2861>wedding,<s%> And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"
